an6.114:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya tayo dhamma bhavetabba.
an6.114:1.7: Asantutthitaya pahanaya santutthita bhavetabba, asampajannassa pahanaya sampajannam bhavetabbam, mahicchataya pahanaya appicchata bhavetabba.
an6.114:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya ime tayo dhamma bhavetabba”ti.
